means: 万分高兴的，欣喜若狂的
使大喜( overjoy的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was overjoyed at his son's return.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到儿子回来欣喜若狂。

sentence.Network_en: Shelley was overjoyed to see me.
He was overjoyed at my success.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的成功使他欣喜若狂。

entry.tran: 欣喜若狂的；万分高兴的
entry.def: If you are overjoyed, you are extremely pleased about something.

example.ex: Shelley was overjoyed to see me...
He was overjoyed at his son's return.
example.tran: 他看到儿子回来欣喜若狂。

auth_sentence.content: They sound downright overjoyed, don't they?

auth_sentence.content: Antonia was overjoyed to have him back. She had missed him sorely.

means.word_mean: 万分高兴的, 欣喜若狂的

sentences.en: She was overjoyed when the doctor told her that her newborn baby is healthy and normal.
sentences.cn: 当医生告诉她她的新生儿健康正常时, 她万分高兴。
